The display of investment opportunities is for informational purposes only and does not serve as an offer to conclude a contract with the bank, nor is it an offer to invest or a recommendation to invest. The return of investment is not guaranteed and is subject to change over time.
 
Before making an investment, we recommend reading through the Fund Status and Key Information for Investors carefully.

Investment horizon How long are you letting your money work? Time can often offset the fluctuations in funds' value. In other words, the longer the investment, the better the return.

Risk How brave are you? Fluctuations are common in investments, what's down will eventually go back up. What's important is to keep your nerve and persist.

help.title: Why invest via Smart Banka

niceBullets.detail: We offer you the best in cooperation with world-renowned asset managers.
We offer 26 funds, the latest are Fidelity International and Franklin Templeton International Services
Our bankers are happy to discuss your investment options

bullets: You can invest one time or repeatedly, starting at CZK 500.
You see return from your investments within 5 business days.
After 3 years of investments you are exempt from income tax.
Manage your portfolio from anywhere via Internet Banka or Smart Banka.

faq.question: Why invest in mutual funds?
faq.answer: Because you can increase the value of any excess funds you might have and don't need for immediate use. On the other hand, if need be, you can recover the money you invested within a couple of days. You can invested on a one-off or regular basis,  starting at CZK 300 or CZK 500 depending on the fund.

faq.question: How can I recover the money I invested and how long does it take?
faq.answer: After giving the order to less your profit participation certificates, whether in our branch or via Internet Banking, a client usually receives their money within 5 business days, but no later than within 15 business days.

faq.question: What is the expense ratio?
faq.answer: There are initial fees to any investment deducted as a percentage of the invested amount. It differs based on the riskiness of each fund. The current fees are listed in the price list.

faq.question: Can I invest if I am not a current client of Moneta Money Bank?
faq.answer: Of course, you don't need to have an account with Moneta Money Bank or any other product. All you need to invest is a framework investment services contract.

faq.question: What amount exempts me from income tax?
faq.answer: All income resulting from the sale of profit participation certificates which are held by the seller for longer than 3 years or if the sale does not exceed CZK 100,000 in given calendar year, is exempt from income tax.

faq.question: Can I transfer mutual funds to another person?
faq.answer: Yes. In order to transfer the funds, the receiver must sign a framework Contract of the Sale or Purchase of Securities with Moneta Money Bank. Then you can make the transfer in our branch or via Internet Banking. The transfer is free of charge.

faq.question: Who oversees the funds (investment companies)?
faq.answer:
Regulation in the Czech Republic is very strict and meets the requirements of the European Union. Specifically, these are the following levels of regulation and control:
The basis is Act No. 256/2004 Coll., On capital market business.
The supreme supervisory body is the Czech National Bank (CNB), which grants trading license and, if necessary, can also remove the license. The trader is obliged to inform the CNB at regular intervals of all material matters and, in particular, of those that have an impact on investors.
The Fund's depositary is responsible for the day-to-day investment. Only a licensed bank may be a depositary. The main task of the depositary is to check that the fund's assets are managed in accordance with the Statute and applicable laws. In the event of any breach of the rules, the depositary is obliged to suspend trading and notify the CNB.

faq.question: How do I know that my investment went through and how many profit participation certificates are in my portfolio?
faq.answer: After each transaction you will receive a statement of purchase or sale of profit participation certificates to your Internet Banka. After each quarter, you can find a list of all your current profit participation certificates in your portfolio.

vocabularyBullets.title: Mutual fund
vocabularyBullets.body: It is a collective investment tool made up of assets managed by an investment company. A mutual fund pools money from multiple investors and invests this money collectively. The basic unit of a mutual fund is the ownership unit, known as a mutual fund unit.

vocabularyBullets.title: Equity mutual fund
vocabularyBullets.body: It invests most of its assets in stocks. Stocks represent a share in a joint-stock company, through which the shareholder participates in the company's profit and management. Stocks are the most risky, and their value can fluctuate significantly.

vocabularyBullets.title: Bond mutual fund
vocabularyBullets.body: It invests most of its assets in bonds. A bond is an instrument through which money is lent to a company or the state.

vocabularyBullets.title: Mixed mutual fund
vocabularyBullets.body: They most commonly contain a combination of company stocks and corporate or government bonds.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investment certificate
vocabularyBullets.body: It is an investment product with specific terms that define the rights and obligations of the investor. Such terms include the duration, method of determining the return, limitations on the maximum return, or conditions for early repayment.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investment service of receiving and transferring orders
vocabularyBullets.body: The bank receives an order from the client for the desired transaction and then forwards it to the relevant investment company for execution; no investment advice is provided with this service.

vocabularyBullets.title: Returns are not guaranteed or insured
vocabularyBullets.body: Investing always involves risk; there is no guarantee that the client will not incur a loss; unlike bank deposits, your investment is not insured by law.

questions.title: If I instruct the bank to purchase mutual fund units for a certain amount, what is the name of the service the bank provides?

answers.title: It is a service of Receiving and Transferring Orders because the bank will forward my order to the investment fund to issue new mutual fund units for me.
The bank sells me mutual fund units from its own account and sets its own price at which I will buy them.
It is a Marketplace service. The bank finds several sellers from whom I can choose the one that suits me best, and I buy the mutual fund units directly from them.

questions.title: How do mutual and investment funds work?

answers.title: Mutual funds and other investment funds manage my assets separately from other clients according to my investment strategy.
Mutual funds and other investment funds pool money from multiple investors, which they then invest collectively. The investor owns mutual fund units, which provide a share in the fund's returns.
Mutual and investment funds offer a fixed-interest deposit. The interest is guaranteed, so there is no risk of loss.

questions.title: What are the types of mutual funds?

answers.title: Fixed and floating. With fixed mutual funds, the exact percentage return is guaranteed. With floating funds, the return may vary in the future. The specific return of mutual funds is determined by the bank in its terms and conditions.

Equity and mixed. Equity funds allow participation in the operation of individual companies and voting at their general meetings. Mixed funds, on the other hand, guarantee that the invested amount will not end up in a loss under any circumstances.
Equity, bond, and mixed. Equity funds are the most volatile and offer the potential for the highest gains as well as losses. Bond funds are the least volatile and usually promise the lowest returns.

questions.title: What are investment certificates?

answers.title: Investment certificates are issued by investment funds. These are mutual fund units for which a certificate of authenticity has been issued by a certification authority.

Investment certificates are securities that can have various features. Each investment certificate has specific terms that precisely define the rights and obligations. Among the most important conditions are the method of determining the certificate's return and the terms of its repayment.
Investment certificates are the same as bonds. The term "investment certificates" has only been used recently, mainly to add some flair to marketing messages.

questions.title: What are the risks and benefits of investment certificates?

answers.title: The advantage of investment certificates is their quick and flexible issuance. For guaranteed certificates, the significantly limited possibility of loss is also a benefit. The risk associated with certificates lies in the need to rely on the issuer, usually an international financial institution, to fulfill its obligations, known as counterparty risk.

The advantage of investment certificates is that they are based on blockchain technology and can therefore be transferred similarly to cryptocurrencies. The risk associated with certificates lies in unclear regulation, which presents a significant legal risk.
The advantage of investment certificates is that they are always issued by the state. The main risk associated with investment certificates lies in the possibility of a state bankruptcy.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investment horizon

category.title: What are your requirements for sustainability?
category.detail: If investing sustainably is important to you, this section of the questionnaire will help you choose funds that consider sustainability.

vocabularyBullets.title: Environmentally sustainable investments
vocabularyBullets.body: These are investments that, according to European regulations (known as the EU Taxonomy), significantly contribute to achieving at least one environmental objective while not significantly harming other objectives. Such goals include, for example, climate change mitigation or pollution prevention and reduction. These are the only investments for which the EU has established precise criteria aimed at protecting the environment. You can learn more about the EU Taxonomy and all its objectives on our website.

vocabularyBullets.title: Sustainable investments
vocabularyBullets.body: These investments contribute to environmental and social goals without significantly harming any environmental or social objectives. Examples include renewable energy, waste reduction, biodiversity, combating inequality, improving working conditions, and more.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investments with adverse impacts on sustainability
vocabularyBullets.body: These are products where adverse impacts on sustainability are monitored in certain areas. We want to know if you would like to explicitly avoid some of these negative impacts in your investments.

category.title: Vyznáte se v investování?
category.detail:
Nechceme vás zkoušet, ale důležité je zjistit, vaši orientace v oblasti financí a investování.

Chcete investovat pouze do podílových fondů? U otázek týkajících se investičních certifikátů vyberte možnost „nevím“.

vocabularyBullets.title: Podílový fond
vocabularyBullets.body: Jde o nástroj kolektivního investování tvořený majetkem, který spravuje investiční společnost. Podílový fond shromažďuje peníze od více investorů a tyto peníze hromadně investuje. Základní jednotkou podílového fondu je podílový list vlastníka.

vocabularyBullets.title: Akciový podílový fond
vocabularyBullets.body: Investuje většinu majetku do akcií. Akcie představují podíl v akciové společnosti prostřednictvím kterých se majitel akcií podílí na zisku a řízení společnosti. Akcie jsou nejvíce rizikové a jejich hodnota může výrazně kolísat.

vocabularyBullets.title: Dluhopisový podílový fond
vocabularyBullets.body: Investuje většinu majetku do dluhopisů. Dluhopis je nástroj, pomocí kterého se podniku či státu půjčují peníze.

vocabularyBullets.title: Smíšený podílový fond
vocabularyBullets.body: Nejčastěji obsahují kombinaci akcií podniků a dluhopisů podniků nebo států.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investiční certifikát
vocabularyBullets.body: Je investiční produkt, který má své specifické podmínky, které určují práva a povinnosti investora. Mezi takové podmínky patří doba trvání, způsob stanovení výnosu, omezení na maximální výši výnosu nebo podmínky předčasného splacení.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investiční služba přijímání a předávání pokynů
vocabularyBullets.body: Banka od klienta přijme pokyn k požadovanému obchodu a ten následně předá dané investiční společnosti k provedení; při této službě není poskytováno investiční poradenství.

vocabularyBullets.title: Výnos není garantován ani pojištěn
vocabularyBullets.body: Investice vždy představuje riziko; není zaručeno, že klient neutrpí ztrátu; na rozdíl od bankovních vkladů Vaše investice není ze zákona pojištěna.

answers.title: Vydávají investičními fondy. Jsou to podílové listy s vystaveným certifikátem pravosti certifikační autoritou (např. prezident nebo premiér).

Jsou to cenné papíry, které mohou mít různé vlastnosti.

Každý investiční certifikát má své podmínky přesně specifikující práva a povinnosti. Mezi ty nejdůležitější patří způsob stanovení výnosu certifikátu a podmínky splacení certifikátu.
Nahrazují dluhopisy. Termín investiční certifikáty se používá až v poslední době, k ozvláštnění marketingových zpráv.

questions.title: Výhody a rizika investičních certifikátů jsou:
questions.hint: Pokud neznáte správnou odpověď, investice vám nemůžeme nabídnout. Chcete si zobrazit nápovědu?

answers.title:
Výhodou je rychlé a flexibilní vydání. U garantovaných certifikátů také výrazně omezená možnost ztráty.

Riziko spočívá v nutnosti spoléhat se na dodržení závazků ze strany jejich vydavatele, kterým je obvykle mezinárodní finanční instituce – tzv. riziko protistrany.

Protože jsou založeny na blockchainové technologii, jejich výhodou je, že mohou být převáděny podobně jako kryptoměny.

Riziko spočívá v nejasné regulaci, která s sebou nese značnou právní nejistotu.
Vydává je stát, což je výhoda, ale zároveň hrozí velké riziko, že stát zbankrotuje.

answers.title: Nechci přijít ani o korunu. Investici prodám při prvním náznaku poklesu.
Akceptuji menší pokles a možnou budoucí ztrátu do 5 %.
Akceptuji pokles a možnou budoucí ztrátu do 15 %.
Akceptuji pokles a možnou budoucí ztrátu více než 15 %.

questions.title: Jaké investiční riziko je pro vás přijatelné?
questions.hint: Vyšší riziko znamená větší možnost zisku, ale také ztráty.
questions.detail: Vyšší riziko znamená větší možnost zisku, ale také ztráty.

answers.title: Chci mít své peníze co nejvíce v bezpečí, stačí mi malý zisk.
Nevadí mi menší kolísání, ale nechci přijít o větší část peněz.
Vydržím i větší výkyvy, protože chci mít možnost vyššího zisku.
Nevadí mi, když hodnota investice hodně kolísá, klidně i výrazně klesne, pokud zároveň můžu hodně vydělat.

questions.title: Jak dlouho plánujete investici držet?
Budete potřebovat investované peníze dříve než v plánované době?

category.title: Jaké máte požadavky na udržitelnost?
category.detail: Pokud je pro Vás důležité investovat urdžitelně, tato část dotazníku Vám pomůže vybrat fondy, které berou udržitelnost v potaz.

vocabularyBullets.title: Enviromentálně udržitelné investice
vocabularyBullets.body: Jde o investice, které podle evropských právních předpisů (tzv. EU taxonomie) významně přispívají k naplňování alespoň jednoho z environmentálních cílů a zároveň významně nepoškozují cíle ostatní. Mezi takové cíle patří např. zmírňování změn klimatu nebo prevence a omezování znečištění. Jedná se o jediné investice, u kterých EU stanovila přesná kritéria s cílem chránit životní prostředí. Více o EU taxonomii a všech cílech se můžete dočíst na našich stránkách.

vocabularyBullets.title: Udržitelné investice
vocabularyBullets.body: Tyto investice přispívají k environmentálním a sociálním cílům a přitom žádný environmentální nebo sociální cíl významně nepoškozují. Jde např. o obnovitelná energie, snížení produkce odpadu, přírodní rozmanitost, boj s nerovností, zlepšení pracovních podmínek a další.

vocabularyBullets.title: Investice s nepříznívými dopady na udržitelnost
vocabularyBullets.body: Jde o produkty, u kterých je sledován nepříznivý dopad na udržitelnost v určitých oblastech. Zajímá nás, jestli se chcete některým negativním dopadům v investování výslovně vyhýbat.

questions.title: Jaká je přibližná hodnota vašeho finančního majetku?
questions.detail: Jedná se o váš osobní majetek, nebo majetek na kterém máte podíl. Započítejte i úspory, vklady, investice a cenné papíry.

questions.title: Jaký je vztah mezi vašimi příjmy a pravidelnými splátkami úvěrů a jiných finančních závazků?
questions.detail: Závazky myslíme například hypotéku, pravidelné náklady na bydlení nebo úvěry. Nezahrnujte platby za základní životní potřeby jako jídlo a oblečení.

questions.title: Jaké jsou vaše osobní čisté pravidelné měsíční příjmy?

Pro službu investičního poradenství je typické:
questions.hint: Pokud neznáte správnou odpověď, investice vám nemůžeme nabídnout. Chcete si zobrazit nápovědu?

answers.title:
Na základě sdělených informací mi banka poradí nejvhodnější produkt.

Já se poté rozhodnu, zda toto poradenství přijmu či nikoli.
Banka bude sama podle vlastního uvážení průběžně investovat mé peníze tak, aby obsah mého portfolia odpovídal investiční strategii, kterou jsme si společně dohodli.
Banka mi prodá podílové listy ze svého účtu za cenu, kterou si sama určila.

questions.title: Zjistil*a jste, že hodnota vaší investice momentálně poklesla o 10 %. Co uděláte?

answers.title: Nebudu dělat nic, kolísání je přirozené.

commonDocs.title: Terms and Conditions of Investment Service valid since 02.08.2021
Information about the Securities Traders Guarantee Fund

funds.detail: BFM Conservative Bond Fund (BF Money Conservative Fund) is a short-term bond fund. This fund invests primarily in term deposits, financial market instruments, government bonds or corporate bonds with short maturity. The average maturity of the portfolio does not exceed 2 years. The Fund's primary objective is to achieve higher returns than savings accounts and term deposits. Any currency risk is hedged. The fund is suitable as an instrument for the appreciation of the financial reserve,  from which we expect high availability. For very conservative clients, the fund is also suitable for long-term appreciation of financial reserves.
funds.featuredDetail: Short-term government and corporate bonds with investments in term-deposits and money market in a fund suitable for conservative investors who want their financial reserve appreciated yet affordable.

info.title: Moderate-to-low profit, moderate-to-low volatility.

The investors are categorized based on their answers to question 1 to 6 of the investment questionnaire (pertaining to their knowledge and experience) which they answered together with a professional and educated investor before they were provided any investment service.
Elementary = 0 to 7 points
Intermediate = 8 to 15 points
Advanced = 16 to 26 points.
Characteristics, goal or need of the client is incompatible with the given investment product.
info.detail: The fund is not suited for clients who could suffer considerable financial distress in case of loss.

funds.detail: UNIQA CEE Bond Fund is a bond fund that relies on high-quality government and corporate bonds with a high rating, suitable for a conservative medium-term investor who has a basic knowledge of financial market instruments and wants to participate in bond and currency yields in Central and Eastern Europe. From the regional point of view, the fund's investments are directed mainly to bonds from the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary and Poland. Investment grade bonds must account for at least 50% of the fund portfolio.
funds.featuredDetail: High-quality government and corporate bonds with a high rating from the CEE region in a fund for conservative, medium-term investors.

funds.detail: The fund invests in undervalued shares of companies with low or mid-cap market capitalization that show stable cash flow or require restructuring. It focuses on German-speaking European countries and the Central and Eastern European region. The fund also enters into so-called short positions, which allow it to make a profit due to a decrease in the price of overpriced shares or a decrease in the overall financial market. Currency risk is hedged.\nThe fund's goal is to achieve high returns. The fund is intended for very dynamic investors who are looking for high returns and are prepared to bear an appropriate level of risk. We are the only ones offering this fund on the Czech market.

info.title: Středně nízké výnosy, středně nízké kolísání hodnoty investice.

Zařazení investora vychází z odpovědí na otázky 1 až 6 investičního dotazníku (oblast znalosti a zkušenosti) vyplňovaným před poskytnutím investiční služby spolu s investorem deklarovaným vzděláním a povoláním.
Základní = 0 až 7 bodů
Střední = 8 až 15 bodů
Pokročilý = 16 až 26 bodů.
Charakteristika, cíl či potřeba zákazníka neslučitelná s daným investičním produktem.
info.detail: Fond není určen pro zákazníky, kterým případná ztráta může způsobit značné finanční potíže.

funds.detail: BFM Balanced Mixed Fund (BF Money Balanced Fund) is a blend fund. It invests in bonds, money market instruments, stocks and commodities (especially gold). The neutral ratio of each asset class is: 70% bonds and money market instruments, 25% shares and 5% commodities (mainly gold). Shares and commodities represent a dynamic part of the portfolio. However, the current composition of the portfolio is changed by the portfolio manager depending on his expectations on the capital markets. The portfolio manager can change the dynamic part of the portfolio in the range of 0-60%. The equity part of the portfolio consists of Central European equities and world equities. The objective of the fund is to achieve returns exceeding the yields on current deposit products within the investment horizon of 5 years. The fund is suitable for clients who intend to invest in the medium and longer term. It is also suitable for regular investments. The fund fluctuations correspond to the asset classes used.
funds.featuredDetail: A mixed fund investing in bonds, money market, equities and commodities for investors who want to exceed the yields on current savings products in the medium and long term.

funds.detail: The BFM Conservative Mixed Fund (BF Money Protected Fund) is a blend fund. It invests in money market instruments, short-term bonds and equities. Shares represent a dynamic part of the portfolio. This is adjusted on the basis of the expectations of the development of the capital markets by the portfolio manager and also on the basis of the protection mechanism available to the fund - the so-called protected value. The protected value is set at 90% of the highest historical value of the participation certificate. The protected value may rise but never fall. The dynamic part of the portfolio is changed in such a way that the fund does not fall below the protected level. The objective of the fund is to achieve returns in the investment horizon of 3-5 years that exceed the yields on current deposit products. The fund is suitable for clients who intend to invest in the medium and longer term. It is also suitable for regular investments. The fluctuation of the fund corresponds to the asset classes used and is limited by the use of a protection mechanism.
funds.featuredDetail: Money market, short-term bonds and equities in the fund with a special mechanism that protects 90% of its highest value reached.

The fund's portfolio includes high-quality corporate bonds, mainly from Central and Eastern Europe, where Generali Group has strong analytical coverage. The currency risk is hedged here. Due to the credit risk, the rate of appreciation is generally higher than that of government bonds. The portfolio's sensitivity to interest rate fluctuation is low.

funds.detail: The client uses the growth potential of the world stock index, which is composed of selected 100 stocks with a high dividend yield from around the world. The favorable development of the selected stock index STOXX Global Select Dividend 100 EUR works in your favor, while the conservative part of the portfolio aims to ensure the return of the invested amount. At the maturity date, the fund ensures the return of the invested amount against any market risk after deducting the entry fee. The fund does not hold any capital guarantee against the possible credit risk of the issuers of the underlying assets. By buying the fund, you become a shareholder and participate in the growth of the given index. If the STOXX Global Select Dividend EUR 100 stock index rises on the fund's maturity date, your appreciation will also rise. Any return of the fund is realized by the mentioned stock index with a minimum 65% participation from the percentage change of the stock index at the maturity of the fund. The final amount of participation may be higher depending on the current development on the financial markets. The percentage change in the underlying index is further limited to a maximum amount of 45%. You can find a more detailed explanation of what can happen to the invested amount and to what amount the appreciation is limited at www.moneta.cz.The fund is suitable for more conservative investors who can save their free money for 4 years and 5 months. The fund is monetary secured. The current value of the fund's share certificate is determined with a monthly frequency, always at the end of the month.

funds.detail:
The US Technology Equity 107% Guaranteed Certificate represents an investment strategy that limits potential loss at maturity and at the same time allows you to participate in the performance of US technology stocks. On the maturity date, it offers a return of the invested amount of 107% and an unlimited maximum yield.

Thus, you participate 100% in the performance of the Goldman Sachs US Technology Equity 6% Volatility Target USD ER Index, which includes the E-mini NASDAQ 100 futures.

The composition of the index includes technology giants such as Apple, Microsoft or Amazon, which makes the index attractive to investors looking for growth opportunities, especially in the technology and communications sectors. The index focuses on innovative companies that dominate the world market for a long time.

The certificate is valued daily based on the current market price, which may not take into account the parameters (guarantee) of the product, valid until the end of the product's lifetime. The currency risk is insured.

On the maturity date, one of the following scenarios may occur:

• If the appreciation of the index is negative, you will be paid 107% of the investment when the product matures .
• If the appreciation of the index is between 0% and 7%, you will be paid 107% of the investment when the product matures.
• If the appreciation of the index is higher than 7%, you will be paid a return corresponding to the growth of the index.

funds.featuredName: Guaranteed Lookback Max Global Equity Certificate
funds.detail:
The Guaranteed Lookback Max Global Equity Certificate is an investment strategy that limits potential losses on the maturity date and allows you to participate in the performance of global stocks. It offers a 100% return on the invested amount and an unlimited maximum yield on the maturity date.

You participate in the performance of the Goldman Sachs Global Equity 6% Volatility Target USD ER Index, which includes futures contracts on MSCI World.

The composition of the index includes stocks from global markets, which makes the index attractive to investors looking for opportunities in global markets. The index focuses on growth opportunities across various sectors and regions.


The certificate is valued daily based on the current market price, which may not take into account the parameters (guarantee) of the product valid until the end of the product's term. Currency risk is hedged.
Maturity structure:

The product offers 100% capital protection at maturity. It uses a "lookback max" mechanism that captures the best annual performance of the index recorded during the 1st, 2nd or 3rd year. The best result achieved is paid out at maturity, regardless of the index level in the last year.

Example:

• 24.02.2026: The index is at 110% of the initial value
• 24.02.2027: The index is at 105% of the initial value
• 24.02.2028: The index is at 100% of the initial value

Result: The investor receives 110%, which is the best recorded performance.

funds.detail:
Investiční certifikát s 100% ochranou kapitálu při splatnosti a atraktivním potenciálem výnosu až 7 % ročně díky možnosti předčasného splacení.

Certifikát garantuje klientovi výplatu 100 % investované částky po odečtení vstupního poplatku při splatnosti. Tato částka je garantována společností Goldman Sachs International (rating A1 od Moody's / A+ od Standard & Poor's / A+ od Fitch). Certifikát umožňuje jednou za rok možnost předčasného splacení, tzv. autocall. V případě spuštění autocallu certifikát v daném roce končí a vyplatí 100 % garantované hodnoty a 7% procent za každý rok. Scénáře vývoje najdete v brožuře.

Klient se podílí na vývoji indexu Goldman Sachs Momentum Builder Focus.

Index Goldman Sachs Momentum Builder Focus je smíšené portfolio indexů nabízející potencionální expozici v následujících třídách aktiv – americké akcie, akcie rozvinutých trhů, dluhopisy rozvinutých trhů, akcie rozvíjejících se trhů a komodity.

Při předčasném odkupu není garantována 100% ochrana vlastního kapitálu, ta platí jen při autocallu, či ukončení produktu v pátém roce.

Měnové riziko je zajištěno.

funds.detail: The Franklin Green Target Income 2024 Fund is a bond fund suitable for a conservative investor that focuses on long-term appreciation of funds over a fixed investment horizon of 5 years. At maturity of the fund in 2024, 100% of the invested capital is also paid out (not guaranteed). The fund's portfolio is broadly diversified, consisting of up to 70% High-Yield bonds with a rating of either low or non-investment grade and showing a higher default risk but usually paying higher returns than higher-quality bonds. The bonds are selected on the basis of the ESG strategy, or socially responsible investment, emphasizing sustainability and a positive attitude towards the environment. The ESG focuses not only on the environment but also on social issues and governance, and includes monitoring and cooperation with companies to reduce emissions or improve water management for a more responsible portfolio

The Fund targets an average annual return of around 2% over an investment horizon of four years (provided that there is no sharp drop in capital markets, a change in macroeconomic developments, etc.). The means to achieve the investment objective will be a diversified and actively managed portfolio consisting mainly of corporate bonds and bonds of financial institutions, and to a lesser extent also government bonds and bonds of supranational institutions. The bonds are mostly denominated in USD, EUR and CZK. The currency risk is hedged in CZK. If the securities are redeemed before the four-year investment horizon expires, an exit fee of 3% is charged. After the investment horizon, ie after 4 years, the fee will not be charged. The currency risk is hedged.

funds.featuredName: Goldman Sachs Global Climate & Environment Equity 🌳 🏆
funds.detail: Fund is a global equity fund suitable for very dynamic clients who can invest their free funds for at least 5 years.  The fund uses active management to target companies that, in addition to financial income, create positive social and environmental impacts.  The fund has a thematic investment approach, focusing its investments on companies that offer solutions for the sustainability of our natural resources, such as those related to water scarcity, food security, energy transformation and recycling economics.  The fund follows the ESG strategy (environmental and socioeconomic impact assessment, and corporate governance) when selecting companies.  In principle, the Fund does not invest in companies with controversial ESG activities and behavior or in companies that violate the principles of global agreements, such as the protection of human rights and the protection of the environment.  We also do not invest in companies that make weapons or tobacco. The fund is suitable as part of a diversified portfolio. Currency risk is hedged.

dipPromo.title: Better Retirement with Long-Term Investment Product
dipPromo.detail: This new product allows you to choose where your retirement savings will appreciate.
dipPromo.bulletsTitle: Tax credit of up to 7,200 CZK per year and the possibility of an employer contribution of up to 50,000 CZK.

bullets.title: Savings with an attractive interest rate
bullets.detail: The product includes a LTIP Savings Account. You can either let your money accrue interest there or invest it in mutual funds for the possibility of higher returns.

bullets.title: One-time and regular investments
bullets.detail: You have access to over 40 reputable mutual funds. When you decide to sell your investment, the money will be credited back to your LTIP Savings Account.

bullets.title: Tax savings
bullets.detail: If you deposit money into LTIP for at least 10 years and simultaneously until the age of 60, you can save up to 7,200 CZK per year on taxes.

advisoryPromo.title: Investiční průvodce
advisoryPromo.detail: Srozumitelně i pro ty, kteří nemají zkušenost s investováním.

bullets.title: Spravovat je budou zkušení odborníci, kteří sledují trhy za vás.
V nabídce najdete portfolia s akciemi, dluhopisy a ETF od renomovaných společností.

noCurrentAccount.title: You can transfer funds into LTIP from any account
noCurrentAccount.detail:
Unfortunately, we have not found any current account with Moneta from which you can deposit money do DIP.
If you want, you can also send money from elsewhere. No variable symbol is needed, just send the payment to your LTIP savings account.
